title: St. Louis Hockey Sticks Retro STL Snapback Hat Baseball Cap
features: Made in the USA and Imported
EMBROIDERED SNAPBACK HAT: Embroidered in the USA, this retro St. Louis hockey hat features a high-profile, flat bill design and is a unique and nostalgic option for fans of STL hockey

PREMIUM QUALITY & FIT: Made of a premium wool blend (80% acrylic, 20% wool) with a green under visor and structured, 6-panel construction, it includes a plastic adjustable snap enclosure and is designed to fit almost every size noggin (from 21 ⅝ inches - 23 ⅝ inches)
VINTAGE / RETRO DESIGN: Features a vintage St. Louis hockey team design with crossed blue hockey sticks; a stylish and modern baseball hat with a simple, retro-inspired touch
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Includes a durable, long-lasting embroidery that won't crack, bleed or peel. This high-quality, blended wool St. Louis hockey hat is definitely a WINNER
EVEN MORE FAN GEAR: Find more awesome items by searching "St. Louis GoTime Apparel" on AMZN
description: Made of a premium wool blend with a high-profile, flat bill design, this St. Louis hockey snapback hat is sure to be a winner with loyal followers of STL hockey and anyone who is from the 314 -- St. Louis, MO. Features an old school vintage St. Louis hockey team design with crossed blue hockey sticks. A unique and nostalgic option for the Missouri hockey fan, this adjustable snapback STL hat is a cool and stylish gift for a birthday, holiday or hockey game.
